languages.text: {n}Маражай окидывает вас взглядом.{/n} "Хм. Верно. Но я не просто наймит, {name}. Странно, что ты не уч{mf|ел|ла} этого, когда предложил{mf||а} мне союз. Впрочем... неважно".
{n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай окидывает вас взглядом.{/n} "Хм. Верно. Но я не просто наймит, {name}. Странно, что ты не уч{mf|ел|ла} этого, когда предложил{mf||а} мне союз. Впрочем... неважно".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira.{/n} «Mmm. Es cierto. Pero no soy un mero sicario, {name}. Me sorprende que no lo pensaras al ofrecerme una alianza. Pero... no importa».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira.{/n} «Mmm. Es cierto. Pero no soy un mero sicario, {name}. Me sorprende que no lo pensaras al ofrecerme una alianza. Pero... no importa».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋瞥了你一眼。{/n}“嗯，没错，但我可不仅仅只是个雇佣杀手，{name}。你要和我结盟时并没有考虑到这一点，这很奇怪。不过……这并不重要。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋瞥了你一眼。{/n}“嗯，没错，但我可不仅仅只是个雇佣杀手，{name}。你要和我结盟时并没有考虑到这一点，这很奇怪。不过……这并不重要。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたを一瞥する。{/n}「ふむ、それは間違いない。だが、俺はただ単に雇われるようなことはしないぞ、{name}。俺に同盟を申し出た時点で、お前がそのことを考えていなかったというのは不思議だな。だが…それは問題ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたを一瞥する。{/n}「ふむ、それは間違いない。だが、俺はただ単に雇われるようなことはしないぞ、{name}。俺に同盟を申し出た時点で、お前がそのことを考えていなかったというのは不思議だな。だが…それは問題ではない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous jette un regard.{/n} « Hmm... Vous ne croyez pas si bien dire, {name}. Pour autant, je ne suis pas un vulgaire mercenaire, et je m'étonne que vous n'y ayez pas songé avant de me proposer une alliance. Enfin, bref... peu importe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous jette un regard.{/n} « Hmm... Vous ne croyez pas si bien dire, {name}. Pour autant, je ne suis pas un vulgaire mercenaire, et je m'étonne que vous n'y ayez pas songé avant de me proposer une alliance. Enfin, bref... peu importe. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich an.{/n} "Hmm. Das ist wahr. Doch ich bin nicht einfach nur ein Söldner, {name}. Eigenartig, dass Ihr das nicht bedacht habt, als Ihr mir ein Bündnis angeboten habt. Aber ... es spielt keine Rolle."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich an.{/n} "Hmm. Das ist wahr. Doch ich bin nicht einfach nur ein Söldner, {name}. Eigenartig, dass Ihr das nicht bedacht habt, als Ihr mir ein Bündnis angeboten habt. Aber ... es spielt keine Rolle."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, . It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Hımm. Orası doğru. Ancak beni uşağın sanmayacaksın {name}. Gerçi ittifak teklif ederken öyle bir şey de düşünmemiştin ama... Neyse artık."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at you.{/n} "Hmm. That is true. But I am not merely a hireling, {name}. It is strange you did not consider that when you offered me an alliance. But... it does not matter."
